                        <h3 id="branches">Branches <a href="/faq/#branches" class="muted tooltipped tooltipped-n" aria-label="What is a branch?"><svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" class="octicon octicon-question" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1 1 16 0A8 8 0 0 1 0 8Zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5 0 1 0 0 13 6.5 6.5 0 0 0 0-13ZM6.92 6.085h.001a.749.749 0 1 1-1.342-.67c.169-.339.436-.701.849-.977C6.845 4.16 7.369 4 8 4a2.756 2.756 0 0 1 1.637.525c.503.377.863.965.863 1.725 0 .448-.115.83-.329 1.15-.205.307-.47.513-.692.662-.109.072-.22.138-.313.195l-.006.004a6.24 6.24 0 0 0-.26.16.952.952 0 0 0-.276.245.75.75 0 0 1-1.248-.832c.184-.264.42-.489.692-.661.103-.067.207-.132.313-.195l.007-.004c.1-.061.182-.11.258-.161a.969.969 0 0 0 .277-.245C8.96 6.514 9 6.427 9 6.25a.612.612 0 0 0-.262-.525A1.27 1.27 0 0 0 8 5.5c-.369 0-.595.09-.74.187a1.01 1.01 0 0 0-.34.398ZM9 11a1 1 0 1 1-2 0 1 1 0 0 1 2 0Z"></path></svg></a></h3>
                        <div>
                            <table class="table table-bordered table-hover table-sortable table-responsive-flex">
                                <thead>
